project.name: FC TIBCO Factory
project.description: FC TIBCO Factory is a modular software factory for TIBCO BusinessWorks

requireProperty.message: You must have a tibco.home property. Check your settings.xml!
requireProperty.regexMessage: tibco.home may not be undefined nor empty.

requireProperty.message: You must have a executables.extension property. Check your settings.xml!

You must have a tibco.ems.version property. Check your settings.xml!
You must have a tibco.hawk.version property. Check your settings.xml!
You must have a tibco.tra.version property. Check your settings.xml!
You must have a tibco.rv.version property. Check your settings.xml!
